examples.text:
Bi' bakışta yaktın, erittin cümle tövbeleri,
Bir gülüşte sildin o eski yaramın izlerini.
examples.translation:
You burnt, melted all the repentances in just one glance,
You removed the traces of that old scar of mine in just one smile.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish جمله, from Arabic جُمْلَة (jumla).
